scripts.start:types: npx tsc basics/types.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/types.js
scripts.start:enums: npx tsc basics/enums.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/enums.js
scripts.start:interfaces: npx tsc basics/interfaces.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/interfaces.js
scripts.start:customTypes: npx tsc basics/customTypes.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/customTypes.js
scripts.start:clases: npx tsc basics/clases.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/clases.js
scripts.start:functions: npx tsc basics/functions.ts --outdir dist/ && node dist/functions.js
scripts.start:namespace: npx tsc advanced/namespaces/namespaces.ts --outFile dist/namespace.js && node dist/namespace.js
scripts.start:namespaces: npx tsc advanced/namespaces/namespaces.ts advanced/namespaces/index.ts --outFile dist/namespaces.js && node dist/namespaces.js
scripts.start:modules: npx tsc advanced/modules/index.ts --outdir dist/modules.ts && node dist/modules.ts
